Class StrokeController

java.lang.Object
com.paint100.StrokeController
public class StrokeController extends Object
Controls the logic for the drawing (stroking) of all the shapes

      Parameters:
      gc - GraphicsContext to draw on
      event - Mouse's current location
      mouseXInitial - Mouse's initial X position
      mouseYInitial - Mouse's initial Y position
      numPoints - The number of points on the star
